TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Structure TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime Implements IDeserializationCallback, IEquatable(Of TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime), ISerializable

summary.span: 提供有关特定时区中特定时间更改（例如从夏时制更改为标准时间，或者从标准时间更改为夏时制）的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a specific time change, such as the change from daylight saving time to standard time or vice versa, in a particular time zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用以指示何时从夏时制，到的标准时间或从夏时制回标准时间，转换发生的结构。You can use the structure to indicate when a transition from standard time to daylight saving time, or from daylight saving time back to standard time, occurs. 此结构支持固定日期规则和浮动日期规则。This structure supports both fixed-date rules and floating-date rules. 在特定月份 （如凌晨 2:00 的特定一天发生的时间转换，使用固定日期规则Use fixed-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 在年 11 月 3日日)。on November 3). 在特定月份 （如凌晨 2:00 的特定一周的特定一天发生的时间转换，使用浮动日期规则Use floating-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 年 11 月的第一个星期日）。on the first Sunday of November). 下表比较了固定日期和浮动日期转换中使用的属性：The following table compares the properties used in fixed-date and floating-date transitions: ||月份Month|周Week|天Day|时间Time| |-|-----------|----------|---------|----------| |固定日期规则Fixed-date rule||不可用N/A||| |浮动日期规则Floating-date rule||||| 固定日期和浮动日期转换属性获取发生时间更改的时间。For both fixed-date and floating-date transitions, the property gets the time at which the time change occurs. 对于转换的范围是从标准为夏时制，这是时区的标准时间值。For transitions from standard to daylight saving time, this is the time zone's standard time value. 对于从夏时制标准时间转换，这是时区的夏时制值。For transitions from daylight saving to standard time, this is the time zone's daylight saving time value. 这是值忽略其日期组件; 其年、 月和日值必须始终等于 1。This is a value whose date component is ignored; its year, month, and day value must always equal 1. > [!NOTE] > 实例结构是不可变。An instance of the structure is immutable. 一旦创建对象后，无法修改其值。Once an object has been created, its values cannot be modified. A对象可以通过调用创建`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)和分别创建固定或浮动日期规则的方法。A object can be created by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods to create a fixed or floating-date rule, respectively. 起始和结束对象随后会作为参数提供方法来创建包含此转换的时间信息的新调整规则。The starting and ending objects are then supplied as parameters to the method to create a new adjustment rule that includes this transition time information. 和属性对象返回对象。The and properties of an object return a object.

summary.span: 定义一个使用固定日期规则的日期更改（即，发生在特定月份的特定日期的时间更改）。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建固定日期规则 （即，在特定月份的特定一天发生时间更改）。This method creates a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month). 例如，始终出现在年 10 月 28 日的时间更改遵循固定日期规则。For example, a time change that always occurs on October 28 follows a fixed-date rule. 有关从标准时间转换为夏时制，`timeOfDay`自变量表示时区的标准时间中转换的时间。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于标准时间从夏时制转换，它表示在时区的夏时制转换的时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 请注意，这是其年、 月和日期值必须所有等于 1 的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下面的示例通过使用固定日期规则和浮动日期规则创建虚部时区的时区转换。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 固定日期规则定义了凌晨 2:00 开始的时区调整The fixed-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 在 3 月 15 和结束于凌晨 3:00。on March 15 and ends at 3:00 A.M. 在年 11 月 15日日到 1955 1900 年。on November 15 for the years 1900 to 1955. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 定义一个使用浮动日期规则的日期更改（即，发生在特定月份的特定星期的特定星期几的时间更改）。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建浮动日期规则 （即，在特定月份的特定一周的特定一天发生时间更改）。This method creates a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month). 例如，年 10 月的最后一个星期日发生时间更改遵循浮动日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs on the last Sunday of October follows a floating-date rule. 有关从标准时间转换为夏时制，`timeOfDay`自变量表示时区的标准时间中转换的时间。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于标准时间从夏时制转换，它表示在时区的夏时制转换的时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 请注意，这是其年、 月和日期值必须所有等于 1 的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下面的示例通过使用固定日期规则和浮动日期规则创建虚部时区的时区转换。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 浮动日期规则定义了凌晨 2:00 开始的时区调整The floating-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 年 3 月的最后一个星期日上编辑并结束在上午 3:00on the last Sunday of March and ends at 3:00 A.M. 在 1956 年以后的 10 月的第四个星期日。on the fourth Sunday in October for the years 1956 onward. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取发生时间更改的日期。

span.span: Gets the day on which the time change occurs.
The day on which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回有效的值才属性是`true`。The property returns a valid value only if the property is `true`. 属性值对应的值`day`参数方法。The property value corresponds to the value of the `day` parameter of the method. 如果其值大于在转换的每月天数，月份的最后一天发生转换。If its value is greater than the number of days in the month of the transition, the transition occurs on the last day of the month. 属性指示 （例如，4 月 15 日） 对其应用的固定日期规则每月天数。The property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). 与此相反，属性指示星期几对其应用浮动日期规则 （例如年 11 月的第二个星期日）。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). ## Examples 下面的示例枚举本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示的所有固定日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all fixed-date transitions. 时间信息包括时间更改发生的日期。The time information includes the day on which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回有效的值才属性是`false`。The property returns a valid value only if the property is `false`. 属性指示星期几对其应用浮动日期规则 （例如年 11 月的第二个星期日）。The property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). 与此相反，属性指示 （例如，4 月 15 日） 对其应用的固定日期规则每月天数。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). ## Examples 下面的示例枚举本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示的所有浮动日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 时间信息包括时间更改发生在星期几。The time information includes the day of the week on which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否两个对象相等，则此方法执行属性的属性进行比较。To determine whether the two objects are equal, this method performs a property-by-property comparison. 该方法返回`true`仅当当前对象和`other`对象具有相同的值的每个对象的六个属性值。The method returns `true` only if the current object and the `other` object have identical values for each of the object's six property values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用方法。The following example illustrates calls to the method. MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsFixedDateRule { get; }
.property instance bool IsFixedDateRule
Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedDateRule As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedDateRule { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是在固定日期和时间（如 11 月 1 日）还是在浮动日期和时间（如 10 月的最后一个星期日）发生时间更改。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the time change occurs at a fixed date and time (such as November 1) or a floating date and time (such as the last Sunday of October).

value.span: 如果时间更改规则为固定日期，则为 ；如果时间更改规则为浮动日期，则为 。

span.span: if the time change rule is fixed-date; if the time change rule is floating-date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定日期规则指示转换发生的相同的日期和时间与其每年的调整规则适用。A fixed-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on the same date and time of each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如，时间更改发生每年 11 月 3 遵循固定日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs every November 3 follows a fixed-date rule. 浮动日期规则指示调整规则应用到每年的特定月份的特定一周的特定一天发生转换。A floating-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month for each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如，年 11 月的第一个星期日发生时间更改遵循浮动日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs on the first Sunday of November follows a floating-date rule. 值属性确定的哪些属性对象具有有效的值。The value of the property determines which properties of a object have valid values. 下表指示的值会影响哪些属性属性。The following table indicates which properties are affected by the value of the property. |TransitionTime 属性TransitionTime property|IsFixedDateRule = trueIsFixedDateRule = true|IsFixedDateRule = falseIsFixedDateRule = false| |-----------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------------------| |`Day`|有效Valid|未使用Unused| |`DayOfWeek`|未使用Unused|有效Valid| |`Week`|未使用Unused|有效Valid| |`Month`|有效Valid|有效Valid| |`TimeOfDay`|有效Valid|有效Valid| ## Examples 下面的示例列出在本地系统上可用的所有时区的转换时间与夏时制。The following example lists the transition times to and from daylight saving time for all time zones that are available on the local system. 对于使用固定日期规则的时区，它显示的属性中的转换时间信息对象。For time zones with fixed-date rules, it displays transition time information from the properties of the object. 对于不带固定日期规则的时区，它使用对象，表示当前的系统日历，以确定该转换的实际的开始和结束日期。For time zones without fixed-date rules, it uses a object that represents the current system calendar to determine the actual start and end dates of the transition. 该示例向控制台显示结果。The example displays the results to the console. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/example1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/example1.vb#5)]

[!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个对象是否不相等，如果它们具有不同任何其六个属性的值。Two objects are unequal if they have different values for any of their six properties. 否则，它们相等。Otherwise, they are equal. 此运算符的等效方法是。The equivalent method for this operator is .

.property instance valuetype System.DateTime TimeOfDay
Public ReadOnly Property TimeOfDay As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeOfDay { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取发生时间更改的小时、分钟和秒。

span.span: Gets the hour, minute, and second at which the time change occurs.

value.span: 发生时间更改的当天的时间。

span.span: The time of day at which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关从标准时间转换为夏时制，值表示时区的标准时间中转换的时间。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the value represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于标准时间从夏时制转换，它表示在时区的夏时制转换的时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 属性定义仅时间发生变化，而不是其日期的时间。The property defines only the time of a time change, but not its date. 日期由和属性针对固定规则的更改，并按， ，和浮动规则更改的属性。The date is determined by the and properties for fixed-rule changes, and by the , , and properties for floating-rule changes. 此日期部分值将被忽略; 的年、 月和日的值始终为 1。The date component of this value is ignored; the value of the year, month, and day is always 1. 属性用于固定日期和浮动日期的转换。The property is used for both fixed-date and floating-date transitions. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示这些时区调整规则的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for those time zones that have adjustment rules. 时间信息包括的发生时间更改的当天的时间。The time information includes the time of day at which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int Week { get; }
.property instance int32 Week
Public ReadOnly Property Week As Integer
public: property int Week { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取时间更改发生在月中的第几个星期。

span.span: Gets the week of the month in which a time change occurs.

value.span: 时间更改发生在月中的第几个星期。

span.span: The week of the month in which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性仅用于使用浮动日期规则的时间更改。The value of the property is used only for time changes with floating-date rules. 有效的值可以介于 1 到 5。Valid values can range from 1 to 5. 属性定义发生时间更改的月份。The property defines the month in which the time change occurs. 属性确定转换发生在其一周。The property determines the week on which the transition occurs. 属性定义转换发生在星期几。The property defines the day of the week on which the transition occurs. 值属性的确定下表中所示。The value of the property is determined as shown in the following table. |如果每周属性值是If the Week property value is|发生转换The transition occurs on| |-----------------------------------|------------------------------| |11|第一个匹配项中的值。The first occurrence of the value in .| |22|第二个匹配项中的值。The second occurrence of the value in .| |33|第三次出现中的值。The third occurrence of the value in .| |44|第四个匹配项中的值。The fourth occurrence of the value in .| |55|最后一个匹配项中的值。The last occurrence of the value in .| 例如，如果转换发生在 3 月的值的第一个星期日属性为 1。For example, if a transition occurs on the first Sunday of March, the value of the property is 1. 如果它发生在 3 月的值的最后一个星期日属性为 5。If it occurs on the last Sunday of March, the value of the property is 5. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举本地计算机上找到的时区，并显示的所有浮动日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 时间信息包括发生时间更改的月份的某一周。The time information includes the week of the month in which the time change occurs. 该示例还定义`WeekOfMonth`枚举，以显示一个字符串，表示的序数值属性，而不是整数。The example also defines a `WeekOfMonth` enumeration to display a string that represents the ordinal value of the property rather than an integer. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]
